actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide that Veterans' Administration grants to States for construction of State veterans' homes be made on the basis of need rather than by the order of application to the Veterans' Administration.

summary.text: Provides that Veterans Administration (VA) grants to States for construction of State veterans' homes shall be made on the basis of need rather than by the order of application to the VA.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide that Veterans' Administration grants to States for construction of State veterans' homes be made on the basis of need rather than by the order of application to the Veterans' Administration.
